title: Aito Resort Guest information centre
description: My first official production project - I built a mobile-oriented information portal website for resort guests. With a React frontend and a backend admin dashboard using Laravel's authentication and database management, this full stack project took me most of the duration of my internship at Nordic Unique Travels. The site is hosted on cPanel with routing through Cloudflare.

title: This website
description: Made with love using React/Next.js. I used Figma to design the page layouts before implementation.

title: EcoMonitor
description: An Android app for managing maintenance data for smart homes. I was partly responsible for programming the UI and viewmodel structure.

title: Rogue Robot
description:
A physics-based driving game made with Unreal Engine 5
Made in 2 months during a summer school project, I was responsible for programming and designing most of the UI, in addition to implementing gameplay systems such as progression and score.

title: Zerowaste
description:
A rhythm sorting game made in Unity. Another school project where I:
• Designed a custom 3D-printed controller
• Created the game environment
• Programmed gameplay mechanics
